title: Epic: Productionize ASL mesh generation pipeline
description: Close placeholder gaps in vocabulary mesh generation and rendering so the project supports real model-backed output and reliable validation.
notes: Initialized 2026-02-17 backlog from code/test scan. Created Phase 3/4 task graph and bootstrapped .planning docs for PROJECT/ROADMAP/STATE/REQUIREMENTS + codebase snapshots.

title: Implement wSignGen inference in VocabularyGenerator
description: Replace placeholder path in src/asl_video_generator/vocabulary_generator.py with real model loading and inference outputs.
close_reason: Implemented model-backed vocabulary inference: strict non-placeholder model_path validation, JSON lite-checkpoint loading/inference, external model callable support, and output parsing. Added TDD coverage in tests/test_vocabulary_generator.py. Verified with pytest (31 passed) and targeted lint/type checks for changed files.

title: Implement mesh video rendering pipeline in AvatarRenderer
description: Replace placeholder mesh rendering in src/asl_video_generator/avatar_renderer.py with real frame rendering and video assembly (ffmpeg/imageio pipeline).
close_reason: Implemented mesh rendering pipeline in AvatarRenderer with imageio-based video assembly, stylized frame rendering from mesh coefficients, and robust fallback to frame export when writer/import fails. Added TDD tests in tests/test_avatar_renderer_mesh.py. Verified with full pytest (33 passed).

title: Add end-to-end tests for vocabulary->mesh->video pipeline
description: Add integration coverage that validates non-placeholder motion generation and mesh video rendering outputs.
notes: Should cover CLI and module-level flow where feasible.
close_reason: Added end-to-end mesh pipeline coverage in tests/test_mesh_pipeline_e2e.py: model-backed vocabulary generation (lite checkpoint) -> motion JSON -> mesh video rendering, plus render_batch mesh auto-detection path. Verified targeted lint/tests and full pytest (35 passed).

title: Align README CLI examples with current entry points

close_reason: Added .github/workflows/quality.yml with automated quality gates on push/PR: full pytest suite, scoped ruff checks for productionized mesh pipeline files/tests, and scoped mypy check for vocabulary_generator. Verified the same command set locally with all checks passing.
